contact.title: Contact us
paragraph: For any information or reservation request, do not hesitate to contact us by phone or email.
You can also visit us at the hotel, located a stone's throw from the beach in Houlgate.

parking.title: Free parking
parking.description: public in front of the hotel

home.title: Hôtel de la Plage
paragraph: A stone's throw from the beach and close to restaurants, shops, the casino and the market. Our charming little hotel will allow you to fully enjoy Houlgate, «Pearl of the Flowered Coast».
Its location between Cabourg and Deauville will be an ideal starting point to discover our beautiful region.

rooms.title: Rooms
paragraph: The Hôtel de la Plage** offers nine rooms in double, triple, or family categories. Some rooms offer views of the Houlgate villas and the sea, while others are situated around the patio, an internal corridor within the hotel.
The room adapted for persons with reduced mobility (PRM) is located on the ground floor, while the others are on the 1st or 2nd floor (no elevator).
